blogPost.excerpt: Zealth is building a software to help hospitals provide continuous round the clock monitoring to their cancer patients, once they leave the hospital and alerts them if the patient is at high risk.
blogPost.body: Zealth is building a software to help hospitals provide continuous round the clock monitoring to their cancer patients, once they leave the hospital and alerts them if the patient is at high risk.
blogPost.title: Zealth - SaaS for remote monitoring of cancer patients
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Zealth正在打造一款软件，帮助医院为癌症患者提供连续的全天候监测，一旦患者离开医院，如果患者处于高危状态，就会发出警报。
Zealth正在打造一款軟件，幫助醫院爲癌症患者提供連續的全天候監測，一旦患者離開醫院，如果患者處於高危狀態，就會發出警報。

previous.excerpt: Generate blob shapes: - Set Solid color - Set Gradient colors - Set a pattern background - Custom image clipping - Save and manage blobs locally - Sharable URL - Dark mode - Works offline and PWA support - Faster initial load and better performance - Blob change sound
previous.title: Blobs 2.0 - Generate beautiful blobs for your design

localize.description: 生成blob形状： - 设置纯色 - 设置渐变色 - 设置图案背景 - 自定义图像剪裁 - 本地保存和管理blob - 可共享的URL - 黑暗模式 - 支持离线工作和PWA - 更快的初始加载速度和更好的性能 - Blob改变声音。
localize.tagline: 为您的设计生成美丽的斑点

localize.description: 生成blob形狀： - 設置純色 - 設置漸變色 - 設置圖案背景 - 自定義圖像剪裁 - 本地保存和管理blob - 可共享的URL - 黑暗模式 - 支持離線工作和PWA - 更快的初始加載速度和更好的性能 - Blob改變聲音。
localize.tagline: 爲您的設計生成美麗的斑點

next.excerpt: Splitsub is a group buying app for online consumer subscriptions in India. Users share more than 25 different types of subscriptions ranging from streaming services to productivity softwares
next.title: Splitsub - Group buying app for online subscriptions

localize.description: Splitsub是印度一款在线消费订阅的团购应用。用户分享超过25种不同类型的订阅，从流媒体服务到生产力软件。
Splitsub是印度一款在線消費訂閱的團購應用。用戶分享超過25種不同類型的訂閱，從流媒體服務到生產力軟件。
